title: Statement Generated
description: Fired when an account statement is generated.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account the statement is for.

periodStart.description: ISO 8601 date for the start of the statement period.

periodEnd.description: ISO 8601 date for the end of the statement period.

format.description: The format of the generated statement.

transactionCount.description: Number of transactions included in the statement.
